description:

title: vmware  message Unicode ascii range

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yuyangwang1985

comments.content: This looks like a bug against oslo.vmware, or maybe oslo.messaging? If you're creating a volume or creating a backup of a volume, then this isn't a nova bug either way.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Which version of oslo.messaging and oslo.vmware do you have here? And what version of cinder?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: This is also missing where the original fault comes from I think, do you have more logs than this before the failure?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: hi Matt Riedemann，i use openstack version is M!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yuyangwang1985

comments.content:
hi:
oslo.vmware                   2.5.0
oslo.messaging                4.6.1
cinder-volume                 2:8.1.0

i use fuel 9 install the openstack!thanks!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yuyangwang1985

comments.content:
i add in the /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo_i18n/_message.py:
import sys 
default_encoding = 'utf-8' 
if sys.getdefaultencoding() != default_encoding: 
   reload(sys) 
   sys.setdefaultencoding(default_encoding)

is ok!

can you has bast idear?

thanks!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yuyangwang1985
